question: In how many years will a sum of money 800 Rs. at 10% per annum compound interest, compounded semi annually becomes 926.10 Rs.?
explanation:
Rate = 10% per annum = 5% half yearly
$latex \\because A = P(1 + \\frac{R}{100})^{T}&s=1$
$latex => 926.10 = 800 (1 + \\frac{5}{100})^{T}&s=1$
$latex => \\frac{9261}{8000} = (\\frac{21}{20})^{T}&s=1$
$latex => (\\frac{21}{20})^{3} = (\\frac{21}{20})^{T}&s=1$
$latex \\therefore Time = 3\\ half\\ years = 1\\frac{1}{2}\\ years&s=1$
Hence option [B] is correct answer
